emuInput.TitMainTitle: Man, possibly Ike Reed, with shaved and scarred head and bandaged hand, seated in interior with floral wallpaper
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of possible related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper August 3, 1957, pg. 9, reads: "Beaten - Ike Reed is shown after being treated by doctors for cuts and bruises sustained when he was attacked by 15 or 20 hoodlums in Chicago. Reed is a deacon at Mount Pisgah Church."
